original_text: Do not hurry to put your hands on anyone to choose him as a leader of the church. Perhaps that man has done something wrong. Then people might think that you agree with his sins. You yourself must always be careful to do what is right and good.
korean_text: 아무에게나 경솔히 안수하지 말고 다른 사람의 죄에 간섭하지 말며 네 자신을 지켜 정결하게 하라

sentences.original_text: Do not hurry to put your hands on anyone
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람에게 서두르게 손을 얹지 마세요

sentences.original_text: to choose him as a leader of the church
Perhaps that man has done something wrong
sentences.korean_translation: 아마도 그 사람은 잘못한 일이 있을지도 모릅니다

sentences.original_text: that you agree with his sins
You yourself must always be careful
to do what is right and good
